origin_dialogue: Use /LookControls/ while holding /LeftFlipper/ to switch targets.
translated_dialogue: Use /LookControls/ while holding /LeftFlipper/ to switch targets.

origin_dialogue: When your MENTAL FOCUS is LOCKED, press /AButton/ and use /MovementControls/ in any direction. Very useful for circling your enemies!
translated_dialogue: When your MENTAL FOCUS is LOCKED, press /AButton/ and use /MovementControls/ in any direction. Very useful for circling your enemies!
